In Kharkiv region, on the night of March 31, the Russians fired at the village of Borova, Izium district, as a result of which one person was killed another injury.

About thisinformsKharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office.

According to preliminary data, the enemy struck the city from the Hurricane RSSU.

“According to the investigation, at about 00:35 Russian servicemen made a massive shelling of the village of Borova, Izium district. A 19-year-old guy was killed. A fragrant wound was 27 years old. He was hospitalized in a serious condition, ”the message reads.

The settlement damages multi -storey and private dwellings, shops and more.

Prosecutors and police investigators are taking all possible and appropriate measures to document war crimes committed by representatives of the russian armed forces.

As reported byАрміяInform, the enemy attacked the winged rockets of Lviv region: there are victims.
